pullrequest.title: region events plugin w/ integration tests

content.raw: Thanks for the contribution. We try to keep to our coding style guidelines - can you run `sh tools/code_check.sh` in the gazebo folder (it'll take some time) and address the warnings in `RegionEventBoxPlugin.cc` and `region_events.cc`?
content.html: Thanks for the contribution. We try to keep to our coding style guidelines - can you run sh tools/code_check.sh in the gazebo folder (it'll take some time) and address the warnings in RegionEventBoxPlugin.cc and region_events.cc?
